dict.acceptation: 燃料；（为身体提供能量的）食物；（维持、增加感情的）刺激物；竞选提神（或兴奋）剂（一种健怡可乐，饮用后能使人精力充沛地从事竞选活动）；

sent.orig: Remove the fuel supply line and fuel rail (refer to Group 14, Fuel System) .
sent.trans: 拆下燃油供应管路和燃油导轨（请参阅单元14，燃油系统）。

sent.orig: And fuel a few hurry in vastigating high brade, fuel lelctrit are investigating hybrid fuel-electric technology.
sent.trans: 还有一小部分地区研究起了混合燃油电力技术。

sent.orig: Fuel is delivered in three common ways: carburetion port fuel injection and direct fuel injection.
sent.trans: 给气缸注入燃料一般有三种方式：蒸发式、气门式燃料喷射、直接式燃料喷射。

sent.orig: Oxy-fuel enthusiasts claim that modern plants can be easily retro-fitted to operate as oxy-fuel plants.
sent.trans: 热衷燃料增氧的人们宣称现有的电站可以轻松地实现燃料增氧。

sent.orig: With engine off, locate fuel pressure port and attach fuel pressure gauge.
sent.trans: 发动机关闭，找出压力，港口和燃料附加燃油压力表。
